messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] getting tired
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Kay. It is nice for me to know there is another mother out there who is unschooling who has health issues of her own to balance into the mix :)
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Kay. It is nice for me to know there is another mother out there who is unschooling who has health issues of her own to balance into the mix :) Sitting down to discuss things as a family before the event occurs sounds intuitively right in my situation :) Joanne

I have similiar health issues and need my rest at night. We sat down as a family and this was the solution we
came up with. Hope that helps.
Kay

messages.subject: getting tired
messages.msgSnippet: I have similiar health issues and need my rest at night.  My dd gets off the computer when I go to bed and she watches TV in her room so that she doesn t
messages.messageBody:
I have similiar health issues and need my rest at night. My dd gets
off the computer when I go to bed and she watches TV in her room so
that she doesn't disturb me. In the beginning I was having trouble
like you are. We sat down as a family and this was the solution we
came up with. Hope that helps.
Kay
